name: True Or Ballse
description:
You are chilling at friends house one night when all of a sudden you get a crazy idea and tell your friend about it. you placer three cups on a table and one ball, your friend will shuffle and if you correctly guess the answer to hi true or false question about said ball and cups you get 100 dollars, and you get 100 more for every question you get right

T: select true

F: selectfalse
